Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Omiscid::SimpleList< TYPE >

Template class to manage list of object.

This class provides methods to go through the list elements. It is possble to delete an element and then go to the next. It is possible to delete an element by giving its value.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

Definition at line 76 of file SimpleList.h.
